attributes.action: Admit the 2016 vote was so close & flawed brexit can't be the will of the people
attributes.background: Several courts have now found the 2016 referendum Leave campaign to be so flawed as to be unacceptable in a binding referendum vote.  As this is the case can we now admit the Leave campaign was so flawed the vote result cannot be described as the will of the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584
